de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.core

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsa.games.fatsquirrel.core.Board

  • public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
    The Class Board. This Class creates a Gamefield Object depending on a Game.Properties File. If there are Problems with the Properties.File this Class will use a Config Class (BoardConfig_Old) instead. Every Task of the Gamelogic itself gets performed at the Board Object.

        public FlattenedBoard flatten()
